attributes.title: Not Worth It
attributes.review: This app took ages to finish fully downloading; 420 days, 666 hours, 69 minutes, and 13 seconds to be exact. It took 2/3 of my phone storage, which was not full let alone close to reaching its full capacity prior to downloading the Trump App. The app drained my battery life in the span of 2 minutes and it asked countless arbitrary and absurd questions regarding my sexual life; including but not limited to: Are you dominant or like to be dominated? Rough or sweet and slow? Fast paced or lengthy pleasure? Any fetishes and/or kinks? The app was constantly spamming my inbox with images of tootsies along with promotional films of Chester Cheetah dancing to the slowed and reverb version of na na by the singer trey songz. All I desired was to be able to make myself informed about the terrific Trump campaign but was instead met with the app being a complete and utter disappointment. The raid of Area 51 with no outcome gave me far more satisfaction than this sorry excuse for an app.
